meanings.definition: The sweet course eaten at the end of a meal.
meanings.sent1: After dinner, we enjoyed a delicious dessert of chocolate cake.
meanings.sent2: My favorite part of the meal is always the dessert.
meanings.sent3: The dessert was so tempting that I couldn't resist having seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a dessert on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The dessert was a heavenly treat that melted in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A sweet dish served at the end of a meal.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant offered a variety of desserts, from fruit tarts to ice cream.
meanings.sent2: I always save room for dessert because I have a sweet tooth.
meanings.sent3: The dessert looked like a work of art on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The dessert was a sugary masterpiece that left us all speechless.
meanings.sent5: The dessert was the perfect ending to a delightful meal.
